Q3. Statements: 1. Importance of Yoga and exercise is being realized by all sections of the society. 2. There is an increasing awareness about health in the society particularly among middle ages group of people.
(A) Statement I is the cause and statement II is its effect
(B) Statement II is the cause and statement I is its effect.
(C) Both the statements I and II are independent causes.
(D) Both the statements I and II are effects of independent causes.
(E) Both the statements I and II are effects of some common cause
